alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 20 at 9:42AM MST until August 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MST /2 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Northern Coconino County including the following areas, Grand Canyon Country, Kaibab Plateau and Marble and Glen Canyons. * WHEN...From 1 PM MST /2 PM MDT/ this afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in slot canyons, creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A surge of tropical moisture will lead to an increased threat of thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall and flash flooding. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons
